lines.text: I hate you! You did this to me you miserable piece of dick-brained, horseshit slime-sucking son of a whore bitch!
That's perfect! I got it all on film, the kids will love it!
I've got it! Nurse, call the Anesthesiologist, this woman needs an enema!
An enema?
No, uh, she needs a pedicure!
This ain't no goddam beauty parlor!
Epitath!
She's not dead, you moron!
Epidermus... Uh...
Epidural, asshole!
[Samuel Faulkner sees needle and faints.]
See? That is why women have the babies. Men can't take the paaai...
[sees needle and faints]
You have a girl. Unless I cut the wrong cord.

[drunk]
We'll crack open another bottle just as soon as I circumcise your son!
Ah, ya cheap shit.
What did you say?
Oh gee, I didn't say nothing mister, you must be hearing things. Bye bye, Arnie loves you. Ya penis-head.
Now I heard that!
Heard what?
I heard what you said!
I didn't say nothing... Ya fat ass pussy.
Okay, okay, what is wrong? OH FUCK ME! It is not working.
If it's not one thing, it's your mother.
Are you alright, Man?
Yes, I'm fine. I was just listening to what you were saying. Um, could you repeat it so I could get it down?
You're an asshole, and my dad's a bastard!
Hey why do you guys really, really come here? Is it just to ruin my weekends and embarrass me in front of my friends at my home?

Your home? This isn't your home. It was our parents home! But I don't see you making any contributions. You've got no wife, no kids. You insult the only family you have. You keep this up and you'll die alone, like a dog, like a bum, like Van Gogh.

[Lost a tennis game]
Fuck! Shit! Shit!
Sam...?
FUCK!
Okay, no more today. What happened to that British etiquette?
Are you sure?
I'm ten days late.
And there's no way you could have had it and just not noticed?
Sam! My water broke!
Well, we'll get you another one!
Who is that, honey?
It's, uh, my mother.
I thought she was dead!
Yeah, I know, it's really weird!
I'm not gonna buy your damn video!
But the kids will love it...
My kids will hate it because they think your show sucks!

[after a long pause]
Oh.
Thanks anyway.
Oh sure, no hard feelings okay?
Alright.
[He and Samuel walk away]
Ah ya cheap shit.
I'll shove an "Arnie Loves You" lunchbox up your ass!
Can't you give her something for the pain?
You don't want natural child birth?
No!
Okay, uh... You want Anastasia? Drugs, yes? Okay, valium.
Valium is no good for her.
No, for me.
NO!
Think, you Commie bastard!
Shut up, you limey prick!
You know what? I would walk over there and kick your bony little ass if I wasn't going to have my 5 year-old daughter do it!
My dad's an asshole.
Okay. Good. Um, is that something you can maybe elaborate on for me a little?
Okay. My dad's a giant asshole.

[after 2 months of abstinence, she finally feels good enough to make love again. But, after a mad dash to their room and settled in bed... ]
I don't think we should make love until we talk to the doctor.

[tremendously disappointed]
Please?
We don't know what could happen, hon.
[pause]
But you know what? I bet if we wait a while, we can feel the baby move again.

[trying hard to be brave]
Yeah. Yeah. Yeah. That would be just as much fun.
I'm so sorry, I was a disgrace, I know now what a bastard I was, I was completely selfish and you had absolutely every right to walk out on me, but I want you to reconsider,
[shows her a ring]
will you marry me? Rebecca, be my wife.
